text: Luis Donaldo Hernández González (born February 2, 1998 in Tepatitlán de Morelos, Jalisco) is a Mexican professional footballer who currently plays for FC Juárez. ==Honours== ===Club=== ;Tapachula *Ascenso MX: Clausura 2018 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Chiapas F.C. footballers Category:Cafetaleros de Chiapas footballers Category:Club Necaxa footballers Category:Deportivo Toluca F.C. players Category:Liga MX players Category:Ascenso MX players Category:Liga Premier de México players Category:Tercera División de México players Category:Footballers from Jalisco Category:People from Tepatitlán
title: Luis Donaldo Hernández
